data.text: @StephenBHeard Agreed. Feel like, in some ways, is actually less safe on campus now than in fall term because no one is tracking exposures/cases. At least then, students could try to adjust how much time they were spending at HIL, Currie Centre, etc.
@kathleenpeacock Yeah, I wish I had some faith in admin on this, but we're two years in and there's still little evidence of careful thought, let along leadership☹️
@StephenBHeard Am so glad you are doing this. Some profs are trying to make spaces safer. Really grateful to those who are, but it also feels really messed up that it's falling to them.
@StephenBHeard Thanks 🙏. I'll have a look. Might also be a great way to relieve my wife's hay fever as a bonus.
@RobinHeinenNL Some basic stats in Wikipedia, it's easy to dig up more detail. Noise depends how noisy the fan is (box fans vary). https://t.co/mgxJwLPJkz
@StephenBHeard Cool. Might be a good investment given the current drop of COVID protections in many places. Just out of curiosity, how much air does such a device clean per minute (and is it noisy?).
@StephenBHeard So happy to see these showing up close to home! My partner and I are making two for our theater rehearsal space soon!
